title: Shorter cuts: Snatch and grab (3/11/04)
creator_credit: Annemaree O'Brien and Bayside Secondary College
brief_description: From the ACMI Primary School Program. Students script and shoot scenes for an episode of Shorter Cuts, based on the TV series Short Cuts. Short Cuts was produced by Burberry Productions in Association with the Seven network and Film Victoria.
